english.segment1: God is with us, for to us a child is born, to us a son is given, all authority has been given to Him,
english.segment3: wonderful, counselor, mighty God, Prince of Peace,
english.segment5: Then I heard the voice of the Lord say to me. "who shall I send?". Lord here am I, send me.
english.segment6: The Lord is the one we regard as Holy, for He is our sanctuary, God is with us.
